attributes.action: Introduce new legilation to force Manchester United to have to rename their club as they don't play in Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Introduce new legilation to force Manchester United to have to rename their club as they don't play in Manchester. 

For far to long now they have been claiming to be a "Manchester" club, this is misleading, they have never played in Manchester (apart from when they play Manchester City).

Calling themselves Manchester United is having a detrimental effect on the devlopment of Manchester, as people born and raised in the city wrongly believe that they are supporting their home town club.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
